attributes.action: Bail out the NHS the same way the government bailed out the banks
attributes.background: The government should bail out the current NHS crises the same way they bailed out the banks because everyone benefits from the NHS, only the rich benefited from the bank bail out.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition which asks the Government to increase NHS funding by a specific amount.
